description: Mappings for equipment cable IDs to name and SKU (source: go/src/samsaradev.io/products/equipment_devices.go). Denormalized: one row per cable_id + cable_sku combination.

schema.name: cable_id
schema.description: The ID for the equipment cable

schema.name: cable_sku
schema.description: The CBL-* cable SKU that maps to this cable ID (empty if no specific SKU)
